cohort.name: Activation Challenge: No First Consult Within 48 Hours
cohort.story: In our recent analysis, we observed that 299 users did not create their first consult within 48 hours of activation. This indicates a potential barrier in their initial engagement with the platform. With a drop-off rate of 11%, it highlights an opportunity to streamline the onboarding process and enhance user support during this critical period.
